body: 10/10. Mega gei and i fucking love it

This is masterful. Awesome. Amazing. Sublime. It isn't topped by anything on this website or anything on Earth. It is the figurative Mecca of everything holy and good for all human beings out there. But for some reason, no one has been paid to fully translate this masterful collection of art. Now, if I had money, I probably wouldn't pay for it- but you know what- Someone will translate this someday, and that day this beautiful anthology will get the attention it deserves.
I pray that someday, it happens. And that day, the world will become a slightly brighter place.
I need translation so fucking much!
